Author: TubeframeMR2

Comment: Note that last November if Harris won and continued Biden's policies the economy was projected to continue growing at a steady 2 to 2.5% for the entire year.  This is a 3% drop, not a 0.3% drop.  Also note that the economic projections for a Trump win were worst case a 0.5% contraction, and best-case zero growth.  We were warned.  What we were not warned about is what is coming next.  The dollar has shrunk by 10% because the world is no longer viewing the USA as a safe harbor for their investments.  That belief is the foundation of our economy.  Trump is cracking it.
